purpose: Facilitates the development and orchestration of autonomous agents using a ReAct-based framework
principle: Employs ReAct (Reason + Act) framework to enable agents to reason and perform actions autonomously in a coordinated manner
reusability: Modular design with support for plug-and-play agent components, extensive API documentation for integration
limitations: Alpha status indicates potential instability and incomplete features, limited documentation on real-world applications
name: Autono
description: A ReAct-Based Highly Robust Autonomous Agent Framework
highlight: Highly robust autonomous agent framework built on ReAct principles for multi-agent coordination
